scripts.deploy:mainnet:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-eth-mainnet-twab-controller subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-eth-goerli-twab-controller subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:mumbai:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-polygon-mumbai-twab-control subgraph.mumbai.yaml
scripts.all-mainnet:hosted: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:hosted
scripts.all-mainnet:decentralized: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:decentralized
scripts.all-goerli:hosted: yarn clean && yarn prepare:goerli && yarn gen:goerli && yarn deploy:goerli:hosted
scripts.all-sepolia:decentralized: yarn clean && yarn prepare:sepolia && yarn gen:sepolia && yarn deploy:sepolia:decentralized
scripts.all-mumbai:hosted: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mumbai && yarn gen:mumbai && yarn deploy:mumbai:hosted
